content: There’s only a few places left to explore that comprise the Yellow Wind Formation, and all roads lead to the Windseal Gate. You found one route after defeating the Stone Vanguard that led down the sloping sand canyon to the gate itself, but there’s more doors we haven’t unlocked with the Sterness of Stone and Keeness of Tiger.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Sand_Formation_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Sand Formation Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Windseal Gate'.
The content is as follows:
There’s only a few places left to explore that comprise the Yellow Wind Formation, and all roads lead to the Windseal Gate. You found one route after defeating the Stone Vanguard that led down the sloping sand canyon to the gate itself, but there’s more doors we haven’t unlocked with the Sterness of Stone and Keeness of Tiger.
